commitResults.messageBody: Update DG with Use Cases, NFRs for `list`, `delete` commands

* Rename developer images to conform to requirements

* Update Filbert's section in "About Us"

* Add RepoSense link to team members' PPP

* Update my role (James) under AboutUs

* Update Roles, PPP

* Fix README

* Add product wireframe

---------

Co-authored-by: JamesLiuZX <liuzixin@comp.nus.edu.sg>
Co-authored-by: SeeuSim <seeusimong@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Ong Seeu Sim <90857020+SeeuSim@users.noreply.github.com>

* Update PPP (Filbert)

* Add user profile contributions

commitResults.messageTitle: Add base skeleton for Dev Portfolios, fix CI

commitResults.messageBody: If there are any more AB3 references, feel free to modify them.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add changes to DG under UseCase/NFR for `delete`

commitResults.messageBody: Add User Stories for `Add`, `View` and NFRs
Add User Stories for `Delete`, `List` and NFRs

user guide.

Edit fields and getter / setters for EditRecipeDescriptor to follow new Recipe model

* Refactor "Edit": refactor Recipe model to better use optional types

* Refactor "Edit": fully update command and parser to use Recipe

* Refactor EditCommandParser, reduce redundant ::get

- Additional serilaiztion and config needed for nested fields (Portion,
  Duration)
- Additional config needed for other methods (toModelType)
- Similar config needed for all other JsonSerializable* classes

* Add attempt at jsonadapted

* V1.2: Fix JSON serialization and deserialization (#86)

Prevents reflective access to constructor for java.util.Optional

* Refactor Storage: Add json adapter type for "Duration" field

* Refactor Storage: Shorten serialization format for Name, PortionUnit, and TimeUnit

commitResults.messageTitle: Edited the User Stories for v1.1 and removed all AB3 related descriptions and diagrams
Add table of contents and links for User Guide
Refactor name rizzipe to recipes in User Guide
Edit language in user guide for accuracy
Add skeletal project portfolio page for each member
